statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.CompanyID , AA.BankAccountID , AA.BankAccountType , AA.Description
, BB.Name as BankAccountName , BB.BankName , BB.AccountNo , BB.Depositor
FROM dbo.TCompanyBankAccount AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TBankAccount BB with (nolock) ON AA.BankAccountID = BB.ID WHERE AA.CompanyID = #CompanyID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.*
, BB.Name as BankAccountName , BB.BankName , BB.AccountNo , BB.Depositor , BB.ImageID
FROM dbo.TCompanyBankAccount AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TBankAccount BB with (nolock) ON AA.BankAccountID = BB.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TCompanyBankAccount ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, CompanyID, BankAccountID, BankAccountType, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #CompanyID#, #BankAccountID#, #BankAccountType#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TCompanyBankAccount SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, CompanyID = #CompanyID# , BankAccountID = #BankAccountID# , BankAccountType = #BankAccountType# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
